form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Information about your residences and employment., NARA (8/11/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 Part 4. Information about your residences and employment. A. Part 6. Information about your children. Claims to the B. Total Number of Children 5 Complete the following information for each of your children. If the child lives with you, state "with me" in the address column; otherwise give city/state/country of child's current residence. If deceased, write "deceased" in the address column If you need more space, continue on separate paper.
